artists.name: Michael James
artists.description: Michael James Down is a songwriter from Belfast, Northern Ireland. He is best known as the composer and lyricist of several pop songs performed by other artists, many of which have competed in the national pre-selections for the Eurovision Song Contest.

album.title: Keep it moving
album.description: Michael James Down is a songwriter from Belfast, Northern Ireland. He is best known as the composer and lyricist of several pop songs performed by other artists, many of which have competed in the national pre-selections for the Eurovision Song Contest.

artists.name: Kiari Kendrell Cephus(Offset)
artists.description: Kiari Kendrell Cephus, better known as Offset, is an American rapper, songwriter, and actor. He is a former member of the hip hop group Migos, which also included Takeoff and Quavo.

album.title: Without Warning
album.description: Without Warning is a collaborative studio album by British-American rapper 21 Savage, American rapper Offset, and American record producer Metro Boomin.

audios.name: Ric Flair Drip
audios.file: 21 Savage, Offset, Metro Boomin - Ric Flair Drip (Official Music Video).mp3

artists.name: Imagine Dragons
artists.description: American pop rock band formed in 2008 in Las Vegas, USA. They became known after the release of their debut studio album Night Visions in September 2012.

album.title: Night Visions
album.description: Night Visions is the debut studio album by American rock band Imagine Dragons, released on September 4, 2012. An extended version of the album was released on February 12, 2013, which included three new tracks.

artists.name: Aloe Blacc
artists.description: American soul singer and musician. His first album, Shine Through, was released on Stones Throw Records in 2006.

audio.name: I Need A Dollar
audio.file: 01 I Need A Dollar - Good Things - Aloe Blacc - Audio.mp3

album.title: All Love Everything
album.description: All Love Everything is the fifth studio album by American singer Aloe Blacc. The album was released on October 2, 2020, through BMG. The album includes the singles "I Do", "My Way", and "Hold On Tight".

audios.name: Glory Days
audios.file: Aloe Blacc - Glory Days (Official Audio Visualizer).mp3

audios.name: I Do
audios.file: Aloe Blacc - I Do (Official Music Video).mp3

artists.name: Twenty one pilots
artists.description: Twenty One Pilots is a Grammy Award-winning American musical duo that originates from Columbus, Ohio. The band was formed in 2009 by Tyler Joseph along with former members Nick Thomas and Chris Salih, and currently consists of vocalist/keyboardist Tyler Joseph and drummer Josh Dun.

audio.name: Heathens
audio.file: twenty one pilots_ Heathens (from Suicide Squad_ The Album) [OFFICIAL VIDEO].mp3

album.title: Vessel
album.description: Vessel is the third studio album by American duo Twenty One Pilots, released on January 8, 2013. It is the band's first album through Fueled by Ramen and their major label debut. Vessel debuted at number 58 on the Billboard 200 and peaked at number 21 in 2016.

artists.name: Atmosphere
artists.description: Atmosphere is an American hip-hop duo from Minneapolis, Minnesota, consisting of rapper Slug (Sean Daley) and DJ/producer Ant (Anthony Davis). Since its formation in 1996, the group has released thirteen studio albums and ten extended plays.

album.title: The Family Sign
album.description: The Family Sign is the sixth studio album by American hip hop group Atmosphere. It was released by Rhymesayers Entertainment on April 12, 2011. The album debuted at number 13 on the Billboard 200, selling 28,000 copies in its first week.

artists.name: Rihanna
artists.description: Rihanna is a Barbadian singer, record producer, fashion designer, philanthropist, and film and television actress. She moved to the United States at the age of 16 to pursue a singing career. She later signed a contract with Def Jam Recordings.

album.title: Anti
album.description: Anti is the eighth studio album by Barbadian singer Rihanna, released on January 28, 2016 by Roc Nation and Westbury Road. The album's release was repeatedly delayed throughout 2015 and was accompanied by much media speculation regarding its recording and promotional campaign.

artists.name: Ariana Grande
artists.description: Ariana Grande-Butera is an American singer, actress, songwriter, record producer, and Grammy Award winner. Ariana Grande began her professional career in show business in 2008 in the Broadway musical 13.

album.title: Yours Truly
album.description: Anti is the eighth studio album by Barbadian singer Rihanna, released on January 28, 2016 by Roc Nation and Westbury Road. The album's release was repeatedly delayed throughout 2015 and was accompanied by much media speculation regarding its recording and promotional campaign.
